channel.title: Cubic interpolation for table read object?
channel.description:
Hello :)
I was wondering if anyone attempted to make a table read object, similar to tabread4~ in PD, that uses cubic interpolation?
I think it would be really awesome with a table reader with a little bit better interpolation.
I have found the code for the Pure Data tabread4~, but I am not really sure what to do with it, to make it "Axo compatible". If anyone wants to check it out, and might be able to make it into something that we can use in Axoloti, I'll be happy to share it.
@TheSlowGrowth: I know that you made some delays with a different kind(better?) of interpolation. Have you ever worked on tables, with a different kind of interpolation too?

item.title: Cubic interpolation for table read object?
item.dc:creator: @jaffasplaffa Mr. Grimm
item.description:
@jaffasplaffa wrote:

Thank you for the answer

I'll look into it, but not sure I have the skills to do so, though.

Read full topic

item.title: Cubic interpolation for table read object?
item.dc:creator: @TheSlowGrowth
item.description:
@TheSlowGrowth wrote:

I didn't do much with tables, but you should be able to take the interpolation code straight from my delay line readers and use it in a custom table reader object

Read full topic
